import {useState, ChangeEvent, FormEvent} from 'react'; function CommentSubmitForm(): JSX.Element { const [review, setReview] = useState({comment: '', rating: 0}); return (
) => setReview({...review, rating: Number(evt.target.value)})} className="reviews__rating-form form__rating" >

To submit review please make sure to set rating and describe your stay with at least 50 characters.

); } export default CommentSubmitForm;
